articles.title: DPRK Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Returns Home
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society headed by Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, returned home by air Saturday after its visit to Iran.

articles.title: Revolutionary Opera "The Flower Girl" Acclaimed by Chinese Audience
articles.content:
Revolutionary Opera "The Flower Girl" Acclaimed by Chinese Audience
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" is being staged before full house in China, evoking lively response among audiences. 
					 Those who watched the opera at the Qingdao Grand Theatre and Shandong Hall gave their impressions in an excited tone. 
					
					 The deputy head of the Propaganda Department of the Qingdao City Party Committee said that "The Flower Girl" was adapted for a movie and opera but it gives the same inspiration to the audience. The revolutionary opera still remains a masterpiece always remembered by Chinese, the deputy head added.
					
					 A prosecutor in the city noted that the opera mesmerized the audiences for its ideological value and artistry, the simple yet truthful acting of actors and actresses, their high artistic skill and unique stage decor.
					
					 Watching the opera today, I came to have conviction that Korean stage art is the best in the world.
					
					 The audience shared weal and woe with leading actors and actresses.
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since the opera was produced, but it is still evoking lively response among audience.
					
					 It was great fortune for me to have watched the excellent performance.
					
					 The opera is much better than any operas of Europe known worldwide.
					
					 It is my belief that the performance tour would deeply impress Chinese audiences.
					
					 These were part of what Chinese audiences said after the watching the opera.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected at Various Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected at Various Units
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting President       Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected at different units of the DPRK.
					 There appeared in Kanggye City of Jagang Province a mosaic "On the road of advance". It depicts Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander and a brilliant strategist encouraging soldiers to win fresh victories in the battles for wiping out enemies during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Standing high in Sangchong-ri, Sijung County is a mosaic portraying the President and Kim Jong Il visualizing the future of a prosperous country on top of Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution.
					
					 A mosaic "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" was erected in the Songrim Factory of Spare Parts for Metallurgical Equipment of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 It vividly represents the will of the workers of the complex to hold in high esteem for all ages the President who dedicated his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people.
					
					 Unveiling ceremonies were held at relevant units.

articles.title: New Documentary Screened
articles.content:
New Documentary Screened
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary "Great Leader Steering Our Party to One Victory after Another" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday on the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il 's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The film deals with the facts that he steadily strengthened the WPK and increased its leadership role in every way under the uplifted revolutionary banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and thus wisely led the work to achieve the brilliant victory in the revolution and construction.
					
					 It vividly represented the historic canvas about the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 It also deals with the facts that Kim Jong Il wisely led the party building and activities as required by Kimilsungism and made the whole country prevalent with anti-Japanese guerrilla working style and way of life, glorifying the WPK into the revolutionary party which is giving a steady continuity to the Juche blood. It vividly showed the facts that he put forward the revolutionary policy on living our own way, led the army and people to live and struggle like heroes and powerfully aroused all the patriotic forces to realize the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior party and state officials and officials of power organs, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions.

articles.title: Moran Hill Associated with Patriotic Will of Peerlessly Great Persons
articles.content:
Moran Hill Associated with Patriotic Will of Peerlessly Great Persons 
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- There is in Pyongyang Moran Hill, scenic spot symbolic of its beauty. The hill is associated with the noble patriotic idea and soul of the peerlessly great persons.
					 The hill has turned into a recreation ground for the people in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea. There are many touching stories about how it has turned into an icon of the country both in contents and style, a socialist land of bliss, and an epitome of scenic beauty.
					
					 On March 2, 1946 President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and woman commander of Mt. Paektu Kim Jong Suk mounted the hill together.
					
					 Looking at the hill, once mercilessly trampled down by the jackboots of aggressors, the President called for sprucing up the hill well as a cultural and recreation ground. He unrolled a grand plan for face-lifting the mountains and fields of the country.
					
					 Historic March 2 was instituted as tree-planting day.
					
					 Kim Jong Il loved Moran Hill more than any others.
					
					 Even when the enemy was making air raids on the city during the war, he frequently mounted the hill. The hill was always in his mind even when he was far away from Pyongyang.
					
					 One day in August 1952 he was questioned by his friends about how severely Pyongyang was destroyed. 
					
					 Answering their question, he said in an excited tone pine trees grew strong on Moran Hill and no U.S. bombs could reduce the country to ashes.
					
					 Then he wrote in his diary a writing titled "Moran Hill Remain Unburned" and poem "Embrace of Country". He added music to the poem and sang the song at a meeting held on December 31, the New Year's eve, playing an organ.
					
					 The hill was named Moran for its beauty like peony. Built on this picturesque hill was Moran Restaurant, gable-roof building to which national, modern and popular architectural style was applied.
					
					 A construction magazine issued in Japan in 1977 carried a statement released by a son of a famous Japanese designer. He said that "magnificent buildings" designed by his father could be found in various Asian cities including Bangkok, adding that the History Museum on Moran Hill in Pyongyang is among those buildings which has become an "icon" of oriental architecture.
					
					 Upon receiving this report, the President instructed officials to pull down the museum and build instead a Korean-style restaurant for the people.
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, Moran Restaurant was completed in a matter of two months after the ground was broken.
					
					 During lunch time in June 2008 Kim Jong Il visited the newly built Moran Restaurant where he recollected stories associated with the restaurant. Going round the interior and exterior of the building for a good chunk of time, he called for improving service to suit the newly built restaurant.
					
					 Let us love and spruce up the country as we do for Moran Hill and let us bequeath the most beautiful and best country in the world like Moran Hill to the generations to come!
					
					 This was Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the country, the people and the generations to come.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Treatise Inflames People's Yearning for Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Treatise Inflames People's Yearning for Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the dear respected Kim Jong Un's treatise "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People", the Korean people are deeply yearning for President Kim Il Sung, who had taken warm care of them in his lifetime.
					 Kim Myong Gil, department director of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "President Kim Il Sung's personality as a great man has been kept in our mind.
					
					 He always found himself among the people and led a common life. He was a soldier in a war field, worker at a construction site and peasant in farm field.
					
					 With this noble personality, the President is still guiding our army and people to victory."
					
					 Choe Han Chun, vice-chairman of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, said:
					
					 "The treatise makes me feel again that the President was a peerlessly great man and prominent leader, revered by not only the Koreans but also the world people. With intense devotion, self-sacrificing spirit, noble personality and virtues, broad magnanimity and generosity, he performed undying feats for the country and the people, the times and the revolution.
					
					 It is the highest honor and pride of the Korean people to have him as our eternal leader."
					
					 Jong Su Chol, head of a workshop at the Ryongsong Machine Complex, said:
					
					 "The President's noble traits can be felt in every phrase of the treatise.
					
					 While reading the treatise, I felt more keenly the fixed will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, pioneered and led by the precedent leaders."

articles.title: Artists Create Agitation Pieces for Surge in Construction in DPRK
articles.content:
Artists Create Agitation Pieces for Surge in Construction in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Korean artists are active in creating a lot of agitation pieces in major fronts for building a thriving nation. 
					 Those of the Mansudae Art Studio, Korean Central Fine Arts Studio and other units created visual aids for agitation of different themes including "Let's leap forward at a breath like lightening" and "Let's do more good things for people!" encouraging the soldier-builders at the renovation site of Mangyongdae Fun Fair. Artists were also seen active at the construction sites of the Ryugyong Health Complex and the People's Open-Air Ice Rink on the bank of River Taedong.
					
					 Artists of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts, Pyongyang City Fine Arts Studio, Fine Arts Studio of the Ministry of Railways and other units created pencil drawings and exercise pieces reflecting the stirring reality, thereby greatly inspiring the builders. 
					
					 Artists were also brisk in their work at the construction site of Pyongyang Folk Park, encouraging soldier-builders. 
					
					 Artists in various provinces are also conducting agitation and creation activities at different sites where a high-pitched drive is being waged.

articles.title: Kim Ung U, Ardent Patriot of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Kim Ung U, Ardent Patriot of Korean Nation
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- June 17 marks the 164th birth anniversary of Kim Ung U, the great-grandfather of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He was a grave keeper but ardently loved his country and home town. 
					
					 His patriotism was displayed in leading the battle of sinking down the American warship, General Sherman, which was a modern vessel in those days.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, who had long waited for a chance to invade Korea, sent the warship to it. The invaders sailed the ship up to Pyongyang along the River Taedong in August 1866, firing shells and bullets towards villages and plundering possessions.
					
					 Indignant at their atrocities, Kim Ung U called upon people to turn out in fighting battles against the invaders.
					
					 On the basis of analysis of the river stream highly affected by low tide and high tide and the fighting methods employed by the ancestors, he took out a tactic to sink down the ship by fire attack.
					
					 Under his command, the villagers in Mangyongdae, together with the inhabitants of the walled city of Pyongyang and the government troops, loaded a lot of small boats with firewood, tied them together.  Then they set them on fire at a time of low tide and floated them down towards the aggressor ship, so that it was set on fire and sank with all hands into the river.
					
					 The battle demonstrated the stamina and will of the Korean nation that would show no mercy to any aggressors.

articles.title: Process for Aminoacid Microelement Fertilizer Built at Tanchon Smeltery
articles.content:
Process for Aminoacid Microelement Fertilizer Built at Tanchon Smeltery
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A process for producing aminoacid microelement fertilizer was successfully built at the Tanchon Smeltery of the DPRK.
					 The new production process of fertilizer would make it possible to contribute to the development of the country's agriculture and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 Fertilizer from the smeltery is being delivered to socialist co-op farms on a daily basis.

articles.title: Health Food Made of Skim Bean Popular among People
articles.content:
Health Food Made of Skim Bean Popular among People
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Dishes made of skim bean in boiling water is popular among local people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Song Song Ik, an employee at Ponghwasan Hotel, told KCNA:
					
					 "Those dishes are much higher than rice, beef and pollack in protein and fat content. Atoxic, they enhance immunity function.
					
					 With such functional substances as vitamin, minerals and lecithin, the bean dishes help prevent diabetes, fatty liver, hyperlipemia and arteriosclerosis.
					
					 Their digestion rate is more than 97 percent.
					
					 Dozens of dishes, including noodle and bread, can be made with skim bean.
					
					 In particular, nutritive skim bean flour is efficacious for recovery of fatigue.
					
					 Those dishes are highly acclaimed by foreigners, too, for their medical effect and good flavor.
					
					 Kye Jong Ok, a woman living in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "Noodle made of bean is little different to buckwheat noodle. I feel relieved from fatness since I began taking skim bean normally.
					
					 Now I can swim for minutes."
					
					 Kim Yong Suk, a woman living in Othan-dong, Central District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "My blood sugar returned to normal after I took skim bean for six months. Now I feel better."

articles.title: Nothing Can Block DPRK's Advance: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nothing Can Block DPRK's Advance: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- No matter how rapidly the international situation may change and how desperately the imperialists may work, nothing can bar the DPRK from advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, says Rodong Sinmun on Saturday in a bylined article.
					 The imperialists and their followers are further intensifying their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK than ever before, the article notes, adding:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK fully demonstrated the invincibility of socialism during the Arduous March when the U.S. imperialists reached an extreme phase in blockading it. Even under the hard living conditions they united closer around the party and further consolidated Korean-style socialism than ever before despite ordeals. 
					
					 The DPRK emerged a dignified nuclear weapons state and satellite launcher. It is now loudly sounding the industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					 Despite the unimaginable test in 2011, the army and people of the DPRK firmly defended with arms the beloved motherland which was liberated by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il brought into bloom as the noblest gains of the revolution.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the leader, the party, the army and the people serves as a fundamental cornerstone of the DPRK's state political system and the roots of its society as well as a source of all achievements and miracles.
					
					 All service personnel and people are united close with absolute trust in the great leaders and faith in the sure victory of socialism. This is the picture of socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 Based on this political foundation, the DPRK society has turned into an impregnable fortress which does not allow any plot of the imperialists to destabilize it.
					
					 There is a limit to the destructive power of a nuclear weapon. But the mental power of the popular masses united close in thinking and purpose is inexhaustible.
					
					 It is just like running one's head against a wall for the U.S. and its followers to try to stifle the DPRK, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak Group of Inciting Confrontation of Social Systems
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak Group of Inciting Confrontation of Social Systems
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) ? Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea in a recent press conference with Korean and foreign reporters talked nonsense that "if the north carries out reforms and opts for opening, the south will sincerely help it," asserting that "it is a good opportunity for the north to make reforms and open itself" and "he has a good intent" towards the north. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The cock-and-bull story talked by Lee fully betrays his long-harbored intention to achieve the "unification of social systems".
					
					 "Reform and opening" touted by Lee without dropping the said intention is nothing but the shriek made by him, much upset by the frustration of his hope for certain change in the north. 
					
					 A snake casts skin but does not drop its nature. The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors remains unchanged in its inveterate bad habit of seeking confrontation of social systems and working hard to realize ambition to invade the north.
					
					 The years of Lee in office are characterized by his malignant invectives against the north, ceaseless political and military provocations and anti-north war hysteria.
					
					 Still fresh in the memory of the compatriots in the north are the most hideous atrocities perpetrated by the group of traitors. It leveled guns at the compatriots grieving over the untimely loss of the father of the nation and worked hard to realize its scenario for achieving the "unification of social systems" while foolishly anticipating "a contingency." 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is a wicked man without an equal in the world as he has neither face nor qualification to talk about noble feelings of human beings. 
					
					 He should bear deep in mind that his scenario for leading the north to "reform and opening" is nothing but a fantastic daydream.

articles.title: Action against Building of Profit-making Hospital Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action against Building of Profit-making Hospital Declared in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Health and Medical Industrial Workers Unions of south Korea held a meeting outside the building of the puppet Ministry of Health and Welfare on June 7 to declare the action to check the puppet authorities' moves to introduce a profit-making hospital.
					 At the meeting the chairman of the Federation had a tonsure in protest against it.
					
					 A written declaration was read out there.
					
					 The declaration disclosed the fact that the "government" is working hard to build such a hospital in Songdo by instituting detailed enforcement regulations including "ordinance for the enforcement of the special law on designation and operation of free economic zone" and the standard for building a hospital.
					
					 The "government" authorities are talking about the advance of medical industry and the opening of investment in development but their purpose is to build such hospital to rake up huge profit at the sacrifice of people's health and lives, the declaration said.
					
					 The Federation will wage dynamic actions to check the authorities' plan for introducing the profit-making hospital, seek the resignation of the minister of Health and Welfare and realize free healthcare, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Outbursts Inciting Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Outbursts Inciting Confrontation
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued an article on June 9 accusing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of letting loose outbursts inciting confrontation with the DPRK. It said the group is steeped in pro-American and pro-Japanese sentiments to the marrow of their bones.
					 Shortly ago, a member of the "National Assembly" from "the Saenuri Party" made reckless remarks calling for verifying the idea of the opposition parties and people who stand for the implementation of the south-north joint declaration, a milestone of peaceful reunification, and punishing them, the article noted, and continued:
					
					 This means that they intend to verify the idea of all the people who want peaceful reunification and of the Unified Progressive Party, adding that this is just a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The article noted that those who should be verified are not people and opposition parties but Lee Myung Bak and Park Guen Hye groups who leave the country and the nation to the tender mercy of the U.S. and Japan, talking about liberal democracy.
					
					 It urged Park Guen Hye to stop going reckless, joining in the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" kicked off by the Lee Myung Bak "government," apologize to the people and step down at once.

articles.title: Peaceful Reunification through Concerted Efforts of Koreans Called for
articles.content:
Peaceful Reunification through Concerted Efforts of Koreans Called for
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Ansan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration staged a march for reunification in Kyonggi Province on June 9 to mark the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 It was participated in by at least 1 000 citizens from all walks of life.
					
					 The secretary general of the organization said that the inter-Korean relations are steadily deteriorating owing to the present "government's" moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots, hoping that the event would mark an occasion of giving momentum to the desire for peace and reunification.
					
					 The participants marched, holding placards bearing slogans for achieving peaceful reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Flay Lee Myung Bak for Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Flay Lee Myung Bak for Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued statements between June 10 and 12 in denunciation of the south Korean government authorities' fascist suppression of members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					 The Headquarters of Koreans in Japan, China, Europe and the U.S. in their statements accused the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of imposing heavy penalties upon leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon on charges of violation of "Security Law" and taking later a fascist action of searching the house of the chief editor of Path of Nation, the organ of the organization, and walking him off.
					
					 This is part of the fascist actions of the Lee Myung Bak group to intensify the campaign against "forces following the north" on the strength of the evil law and create an atmosphere of wholesale suppression, they noted, adding the suppression of Pomminryon amounts to a tyrannical action against reunification and ethics.
					
					 The suppression brought to light once again the real intentions of the Lee group to realize its ambition for its stay in power, the statements said.
					
					 They urged the Lee group to stop at once the crackdown on members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and pro-reunification champions and immediately release its chairman and other conscientious personages detained on unreasonable charges. 
					
					 They called for conducting a more vigorous patriotic movement for eliminating the group of Lee Myung Bak, a traitor sycophantic towards the U.S. and anti-reunification confrontation maniac who is adding to his crimes against the nation, as early as possible.

articles.title: Koreans in Europe Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in Europe Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration 
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Europe was held in Germany on June 9 on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Attending it were members of the European Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany, "One-Korean Nation European Solidarity" and other compatriots' bodies and over 100 Koreans from Russia, France, Canada and the U.S. 
					
					 The participants in the event observed a moment's silence in memory of the pro-reunification patriotic martyrs.
					
					 Read out there were the messages of greeting and solidarity sent from the North Side, South Side, Canadian regional and Chinese regional Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on the occasion.
					
					 Then followed a lecture on implementing the joint declaration and speeches.
					
					 A reception was given on the occasion that day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced in Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) ? The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea carried on its bulletin No. 39 on June 8 the congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations to mark the 66th anniversary of the KCU.
					 He, in his speech made on June 6, 2012, expressed the firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the younger generation and future and indicated the tasks and ways for preparing the KCU members as reserves knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung Formed in Guinea
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung Formed in Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Guinea on June 8.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the committee at the inaugural meeting.
					
					 The meeting decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as remembrance meeting, seminar on his exploits, photo exhibition, film show and lecture from June 8 to July 8.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Norway
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Norway
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was held by the Norwegian Fredrikstad Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 7.
					 Rita Berger, chief of the group, recalled that Kim Jong Un in his work called for effecting a drastic turn in land management to face-lift the land of the DPRK and turn it into a land of bliss and thus implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chief continued:
					
					 The work considered it as the general orientation and tasks to be taken by the field of land management to face-lift the land of the country as befitting a thriving socialist nation by thoroughly carrying out the last instructions of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, indicating the orientation and tasks for fulfilling them, underscored the need to conduct brisk scientific and technological exchange with other countries and international organizations.
					
					 He called upon the officials in the field of the land and environmental conservation and all other workers and people to firmly uphold and preserve the ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on land management and the exploits performed by them in the work, eternally glorify them and energetically speed up the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will achieve great success in land management under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will extend full support and encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Leadership Feats Praised by Regional and Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Leadership Feats Praised by Regional and Nigerian Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A regional and Nigerian organizations posted on their Internet websites articles on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on June 8 posted an article illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article said: 
					
					 The Fourth Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea decided to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and glorify his revolutionary career and undying feats for all ages. 
					
					 He led the WPK for decades, performing undying feats.
					
					 He made sure that the DPRK steadfastly advanced along the road of socialism without the slightest vacillation at a time when it faced the worst difficulties and ordeals after the demise of President Kim Il Sung and socialism collapsed in different countries.
					
					 The feats performed by Kim Jong Il in strengthening the WPK are one of the most precious heritages left by him for the country and its people and serve as an eternal foundation for guaranteeing the ever-lasting prospect and victory of the party.
					
					 The Fourth Conference of the WPK elected supreme leader Kim Jong Un first secretary of the WPK. The WPK and the Korean people will invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under his leadership.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 6 introduced in detail the decision of the Fourth Conference of the WPK to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK and undying feats performed by him in leading the party.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported by Indonesian Personage
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported by Indonesian Personage
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Shapril Arsiyad, chairman of the Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions, issued a statement on June 11 to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The joint declaration is a historic one reflecting the noble desire of leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification and the will of the whole Korean nation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The publication of the declaration marked an occasion for clearing the atmosphere of confrontation and opening a phase of reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south being supported by the whole world.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities, however, totally denied the declaration and hamstrung the efforts to implement it from the outset of their office. They faked up the "Cheonan" warship sinking case and staged massive war maneuvers against the DPRK, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 They barred south Korean people from coming to the DPRK to express condolences before the bier of Kim Jong Il with bitter grief over the loss of the nation's father. Moreover, they hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Korean people and went so base as to slander the celebrations of children. Their behavior has touched off resentment of not only the Korean people but the Indonesian people.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the moves of the present south Korean authorities for confrontation with fellow countrymen and strongly demand them make an apology for all the crimes they committed against the Korean people.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the cause of national reunification, holding in high esteem the dear respected Kim Jong Un, their supreme leader, as the lodestar for national reunification.

articles.title: Vietnam Urges U.S. to Properly Survey Damage Done by Defoliant
articles.content:
Vietnam Urges U.S. to Properly Survey Damage Done by Defoliant 
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Dissatisfied with how little the United States has done to assume its responsibility with the spread of defoliant over Vietnam, Deputy Prime Minister Nguyen Thien Nhan urged scientists from that country to investigate in-depth the inflicted damage.
					 Thien Nhan met here with a delegation from the American Public Health Association.
					
					 Millions of people were exposed during almost one decade (1961-1971) to the effects of the dioxin used by U.S. air force, and its toxic consequences that still vent on young generations.
					
					 The Vietnamese leader urged his interlocutors to lead on the ground a deep investigation, so concrete data were used to demand the necessary assistance in environmental detoxification, rehabilitation and treatments.

articles.title: Colina Moran es testigo del patriotismo de grandes hombres
articles.content:
Colina Moran es testigo del patriotismo de grandes hombres
						
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- En esta capital esta la colina Moran.
					Ese lugar famoso de Corea, simbolo de belleza de Pyongyang, es testigo del noble patriotismo de los grandes hombres.
					
					La colina Moran, transformada como excelente destino de descanso cultural del pueblo en la actual epoca del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, deja prever la imagen futura de la RPDC que sera un paraiso socialista.
					
					El 2 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche, a los pocos meses despues de la liberacion de Corea, el Presidente Kim Il Sung subio a la colina con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Contemplando con amargura el panorama de la colina Moran, que habia sido ocupada por los agresores japoneses, presento un ambicioso proyecto de transformacion de la naturaleza de la patria instruyendo acondicionar bien el lugar para convertirlo en un magnifico sitio de descanso de los capitalinos.
					
					Asi quedo instituido el 2 de marzo como el dia de reforestacion.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il amaba mas que nadie la colina Moran.
					
					En plenos dias de la pasada guerra coreana, el subia a menudo a la colina y la extranaba mucho cuando se encontraba fuera de la capital.
					
					Un dia de agosto de 1952, los companeros le preguntaron en que grado fue destruida la ciudad de Pyongyang por el ataque aereo de los imperialistas norteamericanos.
					
					Entonces, el Dirigente les respondio con firmeza que los pinos de la capitalina colina Moran se mantienen integros y los yanquis no pueden quemar nuestra patria con ninguna bomba.
					
					Luego, dejo en su diario un manuscrito titulado "No se ha quemado la colina Moran" y escribio la poesia "Regazo de la Patria". El 31 de diciembre de ese ano, durante el acto de acogida del ano nuevo, el toco el organo entonando esa poesia hecha ya la cancion de igual nombre.
					
					Otro episodio de la colina Moran se trata del Restaurante Moran.
					
					En 1977, en una revista de construccion de Japon, se publico un articulo colaborado por el hijo de un famoso disenador japones. 
					
					El escribio que hay muchas "obras maestras" de su padre en varias ciudades asiaticas inclusive Bangkok y una de ellas es el museo de historia en la colina Moran de Pyongyang considerado como "ejemplo" de la arquitectura oriental.
					
					Informado de eso, el Presidente Kim Il Sung instruyo eliminar ese museo y dio la tarea de construir en su lugar un magnifico edificio de servicio publico al estilo coreano.
					
					Gracias a la entusiasta direccion del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, en apenas dos meses desde el inicio de la construccion, quedo construido magnificamente el Restaurante Moran.
					
					En julio de 2008, el Dirigente visito el Restaurante Moran reconstruido nuevamente.
					
					Recordo en esa ocasion los hechos vinculados con el restaurante y recorrio largamente su parte interior y exterior dando la indicacion de mejorar los servicios al pueblo.
					
					!Amemos y cuidemos lo todo como a la colina Moran!
					
					!Leguemos a las generaciones venideras una patria tan hermosa y magnifica como la colina Moran!
					
					Estas consignas resumen la noble concepcion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la patria, el pueblo y las generaciones venideras.

articles.title: Construido nuevo proceso de produccion de abono en Tanchon
articles.content:
Construido nuevo proceso de produccion de abono en Tanchon
						
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- En la Fundicion de Metales no Ferrosos de Tanchon de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue construido magnificamente el proceso de produccion de abono compuesto de microelementos de aminoacido, que contribuye al desarrollo de la agricultura del pais y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					   Ahora el abono compuesto producido se suministra cada dia a los campos de las granjas cooperativas socialistas.

articles.title: Pintores coreanos estimulan a los constructors
articles.content:
Pintores coreanos estimulan a los constructores
						
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Los creadores de bellas artes de esta capital y las provincias acuden ahora a los sectores principales de construccion de Estado prospero para desarrollar las actividades de agitacion economica.
					Los pintores de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, la Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes y otras unidades animan a los constructores militares movilizados en la reconstruccion del Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae haciendoles las tablas de propaganda de varios temas, entre otras, "Saltemos a lo mas alto", "!Hagamos mucho mas favores para el pueblo!", etc.
					
					Se puede ver a otros pintores, que hacen otro tanto, en los campos de construccion del Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Ryugyongwon y el Patinadero al Aire Libre del Pueblo que se levantan a la ribera del rio Taedong.
					
					Ellos son de la Universidad de Bellas Artes de Pyongyang, la Casa de Creacion de Bellas Artes de la ciudad de Pyongyang, la Casa de Creacion de Bellas Artes del Ministerio del Ferrocarril y otras unidades y crean ahi sus obras de esbozo y ensayo reflejando en ellas la realidad agitada del pais.
					
					Sucede lo mismo en la zona de construccion del Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta reciente rueda de prensa de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta reciente rueda de prensa de Lee Myung Bak
						
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- En su reciente entrevista con los medios nacionales y extranjeros, el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak dijo que "ahora es tiempo oportuno para el Norte (de Corea) para acceder a la reforma y apertura" y tiene "buena fe" sobre alguien. Agrego con fanfarroneria que "ayudaria activamente al Norte si este procede a la reforma y apertura".
					En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo que tales dichos de Lee parten de su anejada ambicion sobre la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					Ese traidor habla todavia de la "reforma y apertura" si bien quedo frustrada totalmente su necia intencion de inducir al Norte a algun cambio.
					
					Sigue invariable la cronica ambicion de la camarilla de Lee de enfrentar los regimenes del Norte y el Sur de Corea y agredir a la RPDC.
					
					En su mandato, Lee irrito constantemente a la RPDC hablando mal de ella y cometiendo acciones provocativas y agresivas en sentidos politico y militar.
					
					El pueblo de la RPDC recuerda frescamente todavia el peor crimen de la banda de Lee que apunto su fusil a los connacionales enlutados por el deceso del padre de la nacion y trato de realizar su intento de la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" esperando estupidamente el supuesto "estado de emergencia" en la RPDC.
					
					El traidor Lee ni siquiera tiene derecho a mencionar el noble sentimiento del hombre.
